org.ligoj.app.dao

Interface NodeRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Node,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Node,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Node,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Node>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Node,java.lang.String>, org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<Node,java.lang.String>

    public interface NodeRepository
extends org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<Node,java.lang.String>
    Node repository

    • Method Detail

      • findAllWithValuesSecure

        @Query(value="SELECT n, p FROM ParameterValue p RIGHT JOIN p.node n LEFT JOIN p.parameter param ON (param.id=p.parameter.id AND param.secured != TRUE) ORDER BY UPPER(n.name)")
java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> findAllWithValuesSecure()
        Return all nodes with all non secured parameters.
        Returns:
        the nodes.

      • findAllInstance

        @Query(value="FROM Node n INNER JOIN FETCH n.refined tool WHERE tool.refined IS NOT NULL ORDER BY UPPER(n.name)")
java.util.List<Node> findAllInstance()
        Return final nodes, so representing a node (running instance) of a tool.
        Returns:
        instance nodes considered as final .

      • findAllInstance

        @Query(value="FROM Node n INNER JOIN FETCH n.refined tool WHERE tool.refined IS NOT NULL AND ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM DelegateNode d WHERE (n.id LIKE CONCAT(d.name, \':%\') OR d.name=n.id) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description)))))))) ORDER BY UPPER(n.name)")
java.util.List<Node> findAllInstance(java.lang.String user)
        Return final nodes, so representing a node (running instance) of a tool and visible for a given user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user requesting the nodes.
        Returns:
        instance nodes considered as final .

      • countNodeSubscriptions

        @Query(value="SELECT n.id, count(sub) FROM Subscription sub INNER JOIN sub.node n WHERE ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM DelegateNode d WHERE (n.id LIKE CONCAT(d.name, \':%\') OR d.name=n.id) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description)))))))) GROUP BY n.id")
java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> countNodeSubscriptions(java.lang.String user)
        Count subscriptions by node and visible to a given user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user requesting the nodes.
        Returns:
        node subscriptions count

      • findOneVisible

        @Query(value="FROM Node n WHERE n.id=:id AND ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM DelegateNode d WHERE (n.id LIKE CONCAT(d.name, \':%\') OR d.name=n.id) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description))))))))")

        user - The user requesting the node.
        Returns:

      • findOneWritable

        @Query(value="FROM Node n WHERE n.id=:id AND ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM DelegateNode d WHERE (n.id LIKE CONCAT(d.name, \':%\') OR d.name=n.id) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description)))))) AND (d.canWrite = true OR d.canAdmin = true)))")

      • findOneAdministerable

        @Query(value="FROM Node n WHERE n.id=:id AND ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM DelegateNode d WHERE (n.id LIKE CONCAT(d.name, \':%\') OR d.name=n.id) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description)))))) AND d.canAdmin = true))")
Node findOneAdministerable(java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String user)
        Return a Node by its identifier if it is visible and administered for the current user.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier to find.
        user - The user requesting the node.
        Returns:
        The visible node or null.

      • findAllVisible

        @Query(value="SELECT n FROM Node n LEFT JOIN n.refined nr1 LEFT JOIN nr1.refined nr2 WHERE (:parent IS NULL OR (:parent = \'service\' AND n.refined IS NULL) OR n.refined.id = :parent) AND (:depth < 0 OR :depth > 1 OR (:depth = 0 AND nr1 IS NULL) OR (:depth = 1 AND nr2 IS NULL))   AND (:mode IS NULL OR n.mode = :mode OR n.mode = org.ligoj.app.api.SubscriptionMode.ALL)         AND (UPPER(n.name) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(\'%\',:criteria),\'%\'))) AND ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM DelegateNode d WHERE (n.id LIKE CONCAT(d.name, \':%\') OR d.name=n.id) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description)))))))) ORDER BY n.id")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Node> findAllVisible(java.lang.String user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String criteria,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String parent,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               org.ligoj.app.api.SubscriptionMode mode,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               int depth,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable page)
        Return all visible Node for current user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user requesting the nodes.
        criteria - The optional criteria to match in the name.
        parent - The optional parent identifier to be like. Special attention for 'service' value corresponding to the root.
        mode - Expected subscription mode. When null, the node's mode is not checked.
        depth - The maximal depth. When 0 means no refined, so basically services only. 1 means refined is a service, so nodes are basically tool only. 2 means refined is a tool, so nodes are basically instances only. For the other cases, there is no limit.
        page - The pagination.
        Returns:
        The visible nodes. Ordered by their identifier.

      • findOneForSubscription

        @Query(value="FROM Node n WHERE n.id=:id AND ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM DelegateNode d WHERE (n.id LIKE CONCAT(d.name, \':%\') OR d.name=n.id) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description)))))) AND (d.canSubscribe = true OR d.canWrite = true OR d.canAdmin = true)))")
Node findOneForSubscription(java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String user)
        Return a Node by its identifier if it is visible for current user and if this user can create a subscription on it.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier to find.
        user - The user requesting the node.
        Returns:
        The visible node the user can subscribe or null.

      • countByRefined

        @Query(value="SELECT count(id) FROM Node WHERE refined.refined.id = ?1 OR refined.id = ?1")
int countByRefined(java.lang.String node)
        Return the amount of nodes having the parent node.
        Parameters:
        node - The parent node identifier. Directly or not.
        Returns:
        The amount of nodes having the parent node.
